3DTetris.Name: 3D Tetris
3DTetris.Description: 3D Tetris is a three-dimensional version of the classic Tetris game, challenging players to manipulate and stack 3D shapes in a confined space.
3DTetris.Creator: T&E Soft

AnimalCrossingWildWorld.Name: Animal Crossing: Wild World
AnimalCrossingWildWorld.Description: Animal Crossing: Wild World is a social simulation game where players live in a village inhabited by anthropomorphic animals, performing various activities like fishing, bug catching, and fossil hunting.
AnimalCrossingWildWorld.Creator: Nintendo

Banjo-Kazooie.Name: Banjo-Kazooie
Banjo-Kazooie.Description: Banjo-Kazooie is a 1998 platform game developed by Rare. Players control Banjo and his friend Kazooie as they try to rescue Banjo's sister Tooty from the evil witch Gruntilda.
Banjo-Kazooie.Creator: Rare

BlastCorps.Name: Blast Corps
BlastCorps.Description: Blast Corps is a 1997 action puzzle game developed by Rare. Players must demolish buildings and clear paths for a runaway nuclear missile carrier.
BlastCorps.Creator: Rare

BodyHarvest.Name: Body Harvest
BodyHarvest.Description: Body Harvest is a 1998 action-adventure game developed by DMA Design. Players must thwart an alien invasion by traveling through time and fighting off aliens in various time periods.
BodyHarvest.Creator: DMA Design

Bomberman64.Name: Bomberman 64
Bomberman64.Description: Bomberman 64 is a 1997 action puzzle game. Players navigate 3D environments to defeat opponents using bombs while solving puzzles.
Bomberman64.Creator: Hudson Soft

BrainAge.Name: Brain Age 1
BrainAge.Description: Brain Age is a series of mental training games designed to help players improve their cognitive abilities through daily exercises.
BrainAge.Creator: Nintendo

BrainAge2.Name: Brain Age 2
BrainAge2.Description: Brain Age 2 is the sequel to the original Brain Age, offering new mental exercises and activities to further challenge players' cognitive skills.
BrainAge2.Creator: Nintendo

ConkersBadFurDay.Name: Conker's Bad Fur Day
ConkersBadFurDay.Description: Conker's Bad Fur Day is a 2001 platform game developed by Rare. Players control Conker as he navigates a world filled with humor and adult themes.
ConkersBadFurDay.Creator: Rare

CookieClicker.Name: Cookie Clicker
CookieClicker.Description: Cookie Clicker is an incremental game developed by Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot. Players click on a large cookie to earn cookies, which can be spent on upgrades and buildings to produce more cookies automatically.
CookieClicker.Creator: Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot

CookieClickerClassic.Name: Cookie Clicker Classic
CookieClickerClassic.Description: Cookie Clicker Classic is the original version of the incremental game developed by Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot. It features the same core mechanics of clicking a cookie to earn cookies, which are used to purchase upgrades and buildings for automated cookie production. This version laid the foundation for future iterations but retains a simpler, more retro experience.
CookieClickerClassic.Creator: Julien 'Orteil' Thiennot

CookingMama.Name: Cooking Mama
CookingMama.Description: Cooking Mama is a cooking simulation game where players prepare various recipes through mini-games. It's known for its charming graphics and engaging gameplay.
CookingMama.Creator: Cooking Mama Limited

CookingMama2.Name: Cooking Mama 2: Dinner With Friends
CookingMama2.Description: The sequel to Cooking Mama, this game offers new recipes and multiplayer modes, allowing friends to join in the cooking fun.
CookingMama2.Creator: Cooking Mama Limited

DiddyKongRacing.Name: Diddy Kong Racing
DiddyKongRacing.Description: Diddy Kong Racing is a 1997 racing game featuring characters from the Rare universe. Players race on various tracks using karts, hovercrafts, and airplanes.
DiddyKongRacing.Creator: Rare

EmulatorCustom.Name: Emulator
EmulatorCustom.Description: An emulator that allows users to run custom game files, providing an experience similar to the original hardware. Supports various file formats and custom modifications.
EmulatorCustom.Creator: EmulatorJS

FinalFantasyVII.Name: Final Fantasy VII
FinalFantasyVII.Description: Final Fantasy VII is a 1997 role-playing game developed by Square. The story follows Cloud Strife, a mercenary who joins an eco-terrorist group to stop a megacorporation from draining the planet's life energy. The game features a blend of turn-based combat, exploration, and cinematic storytelling.
FinalFantasyVII.Creator: Square

GalacticPinball.Name: Galactic Pinball
GalacticPinball.Description: Galactic Pinball is a space-themed pinball game for the Virtual Boy, featuring multiple tables with unique layouts and objectives.
GalacticPinball.Creator: Nintendo

Golf.Name: Golf
Golf.Description: Golf for the Virtual Boy is a 3D golf simulation game that allows players to experience golfing with the unique visual style of the Virtual Boy system.
Golf.Creator: T&E Soft

HelloKittyBigCityDreams.Name: Hello Kitty: Big City Dreams
HelloKittyBigCityDreams.Description: In this game, players explore a vibrant city with Hello Kitty, completing tasks and meeting friends in a fun and colorful world.
HelloKittyBigCityDreams.Creator: Sanrio

HelloKittyBirthdayAdventures.Name: Hello Kitty: Birthday Adventures
HelloKittyBirthdayAdventures.Description: Players join Hello Kitty and her friends as they prepare for a birthday party, completing mini-games and challenges.
HelloKittyBirthdayAdventures.Creator: Sanrio

HelloKittyParty.Name: Hello Kitty: Party
HelloKittyParty.Description: A party game featuring Hello Kitty and friends, with various mini-games and activities suitable for players of all ages.
HelloKittyParty.Creator: Sanrio

JackBros.Name: Jack Bros.
JackBros.Description: Jack Bros. is an action-adventure game featuring characters from the Megami Tensei series, adapted for the Virtual Boy's 3D capabilities.
JackBros.Creator: Atlus

JetForceGemini.Name: Jet Force Gemini
JetForceGemini.Description: Jet Force Gemini is a 1999 third-person shooter developed by Rare, featuring characters Juno and Vela as they fight against the evil Mizar.
JetForceGemini.Creator: Rare

KirbySuperStarUltra.Name: Kirby Super Star Ultra
KirbySuperStarUltra.Description: Kirby Super Star Ultra is a 2008 action-platformer game developed by HAL Laboratory for the Nintendo DS. It is a remake of the original Kirby Super Star for the SNES, featuring multiple game modes and enhanced graphics, allowing players to control Kirby as he absorbs enemies' powers and fights to save Dream Land.
KirbySuperStarUltra.Creator: HAL Laboratory

MarioClash.Name: Mario Clash
MarioClash.Description: Mario Clash is a 3D remake of the original Mario Bros. arcade game, utilizing the Virtual Boy's 3D effects to create depth in gameplay.
MarioClash.Creator: Nintendo

MarioKart64.Name: Mario Kart 64
MarioKart64.Description: Mario Kart 64 is a 1996 kart racing game featuring characters from the Mario franchise. Players race on various tracks using power-ups and items.
MarioKart64.Creator: Nintendo

MarioKartDS.Name: Mario Kart DS
MarioKartDS.Description: Mario Kart DS is a racing game featuring characters from the Mario series. It includes both single-player and multiplayer modes, as well as online play.
MarioKartDS.Creator: Nintendo

MarioPartyDS.Name: Mario Party DS
MarioPartyDS.Description: Mario Party DS is a party game featuring Mario characters. Players compete in various mini-games and move around game boards to collect stars.
MarioPartyDS.Creator: Hudson Soft

MariosTennis.Name: Mario's Tennis
MariosTennis.Description: Mario's Tennis is a tennis game featuring Mario characters, designed to showcase the 3D capabilities of the Virtual Boy system.
MariosTennis.Creator: Nintendo

MyLittlePonyCrystalPrincess.Name: My Little Pony: Crystal Princess - The Runaway Rainbow
MyLittlePonyCrystalPrincess.Description: My Little Pony: Crystal Princess - The Runaway Rainbow is a 2006 adventure game where players help the ponies restore color to Ponyville by completing mini-games and solving puzzles.
MyLittlePonyCrystalPrincess.Creator: Majesco Entertainment

NewSuperMarioBros.Name: New Super Mario Bros.
NewSuperMarioBros.Description: New Super Mario Bros. is a 2006 side-scrolling platform game developed and published by Nintendo. The game features Mario as he navigates through various levels to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.
NewSuperMarioBros.Creator: Nintendo

LabradorAndFriends.Name: Nintendogs - Labrador & Friends
LabradorAndFriends.Description: Nintendogs - Labrador & Friends is a virtual pet simulation game where players raise, train, and care for puppies of various breeds. The game utilizes the Nintendo DS's touchscreen and microphone for interactive gameplay, allowing players to pet, feed, and teach their virtual dogs new tricks.
LabradorAndFriends.Creator: Nintendo

PaperMario.Name: Paper Mario
PaperMario.Description: Paper Mario is a 2000 role-playing game that combines traditional RPG elements with a unique paper aesthetic, following Mario's quest to rescue Princess Peach.
PaperMario.Creator: Intelligent Systems

PanicBomber.Name: Panic Bomber
PanicBomber.Description: Panic Bomber is a puzzle game for the Virtual Boy that combines elements of Bomberman and falling block puzzles in a 3D environment.
PanicBomber.Creator: Hudson Soft

PaRappatheRapper.Name: PaRappa the Rapper
PaRappatheRapper.Description: PaRappa the Rapper is a rhythm game that follows PaRappa, a paper-thin dog, as he learns various skills by rapping along with his mentors to win the heart of his crush, Sunny Funny.
PaRappatheRapper.Creator: NanaOn-Sha

PokemonBlack.Name: Pokémon Black Version
PokemonBlack.Description: Pokémon Black Version is a role-playing game where players catch, train, and battle Pokémon. It introduces new Pokémon and features a new region to explore.
PokemonBlack.Creator: Game Freak

PokemonCrystal.Name: Pokémon Crystal
PokemonCrystal.Description: Pokémon Crystal is an enhanced version of Pokémon Gold and Silver, introducing animated sprites and the option to play as a female character.
PokemonCrystal.Creator: Game Freak

PokemonDiamond.Name: Pokémon Diamond Version
PokemonDiamond.Description: Pokémon Diamond Version is a role-playing game set in the Sinnoh region. Players embark on a journey to become the Pokémon Champion while thwarting the plans of Team Galactic.
PokemonDiamond.Creator: Game Freak

PokemonHeartGold.Name: Pokémon HeartGold Version
PokemonHeartGold.Description: Pokémon HeartGold Version is a remake of the original Pokémon Gold, featuring updated graphics and new gameplay elements while retaining the classic storyline.
PokemonHeartGold.Creator: Game Freak

PokemonPearl.Name: Pokémon Pearl Version
PokemonPearl.Description: Pokémon Pearl Version is a role-playing game set in the Sinnoh region, released alongside Pokémon Diamond. It features slightly different Pokémon availability compared to Diamond.
PokemonPearl.Creator: Game Freak

PokemonSoulSilver.Name: Pokémon SoulSilver Version
PokemonSoulSilver.Description: Pokémon SoulSilver Version is a remake of the original Pokémon Silver, featuring updated graphics and new gameplay elements while retaining the classic storyline.
PokemonSoulSilver.Creator: Game Freak

PokemonWhite.Name: Pokémon White Version
PokemonWhite.Description: Pokémon White Version is a role-playing game where players catch, train, and battle Pokémon. It introduces new Pokémon and features a new region to explore, with some differences from Pokémon Black.
PokemonWhite.Creator: Game Freak

RedAlarm.Name: Red Alarm
RedAlarm.Description: Red Alarm is a 3D space combat simulator for the Virtual Boy, featuring wire-frame graphics and intense dogfighting action.
RedAlarm.Creator: T&E Soft

RhythmHeaven.Name: Rhythm Heaven
RhythmHeaven.Description: Rhythm Heaven is a music-based rhythm game where players complete various rhythm-based challenges, syncing button presses with the beat to progress through quirky and fun minigames.
RhythmHeaven.Creator: Nintendo

SDGundamDimensionWar.Name: SD Gundam Dimension War
SDGundamDimensionWar.Description: SD Gundam Dimension War is a strategy game based on the Gundam franchise, adapted for the Virtual Boy's 3D display.
SDGundamDimensionWar.Creator: Bandai

SilentHill.Name: Silent Hill
SilentHill.Description: Silent Hill is a survival horror game developed by Konami, released for the PlayStation in 1999. Players assume the role of Harry Mason, searching for his missing adopted daughter in the eerie town of Silent Hill, filled with disturbing monsters and psychological horror elements.
SilentHill.Creator: Konami

SpaceInvadersVirtualCollection.Name: Space Invaders Virtual Collection
SpaceInvadersVirtualCollection.Description: Space Invaders Virtual Collection is a 3D remake of the classic Space Invaders game, featuring both classic and updated gameplay modes.
SpaceInvadersVirtualCollection.Creator: Taito

SpaceSquash.Name: Space Squash
SpaceSquash.Description: Space Squash is a futuristic sports game for the Virtual Boy that combines elements of tennis and squash in a 3D environment.
SpaceSquash.Creator: Hudson Soft

SuperMario64.Name: Super Mario 64
SuperMario64.Description: Super Mario 64 is a 1996 platform game for the Nintendo 64 and the first in the Super Mario series to feature 3D gameplay. As Mario, the player explores Princess Peach's castle and must rescue her from Bowser.
SuperMario64.Creator: Nintendo

SuperMario64DS.Name: Super Mario 64 DS
SuperMario64DS.Description: Super Mario 64 DS is a remake of the Nintendo 64 game Super Mario 64, featuring new playable characters, enhanced graphics, and additional content.
SuperMario64DS.Creator: Nintendo

SuperMarioWorld.Name: Super Mario World
SuperMarioWorld.Description: Super Mario World is a 1990 platform game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. The player controls Mario or Luigi as they travel through the Dinosaur Land to rescue Princess Toadstool from Bowser, while defeating enemies and completing levels. The game introduces Yoshi, a dinosaur companion.
SuperMarioWorld.Creator: Nintendo

SuperSmashBros.Name: Super Smash Bros
SuperSmashBros.Description: Super Smash Bros is a 1999 fighting game featuring characters from various Nintendo franchises. Players battle in a variety of stages using unique character abilities.
SuperSmashBros.Creator: Nintendo

TanukiSunsetClassic.Name: Tanuki Sunset Classic
TanukiSunsetClassic.Description: Tanuki Sunset Classic is a vibrant racing game where players control a tanuki on a skateboard, gliding through colorful landscapes while avoiding obstacles and collecting items to achieve high scores.
TanukiSunsetClassic.Creator: Noodlecake Studios

Teleroboxer.Name: Teleroboxer
Teleroboxer.Description: Teleroboxer is a first-person boxing game for the Virtual Boy, where players fight against robot opponents in 3D arenas.
Teleroboxer.Creator: Nintendo

MajorasMask.Name: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask
MajorasMask.Description: Majora's Mask is a 2000 action-adventure game and the direct sequel to Ocarina of Time. Players have three days to save the world of Termina from destruction.
MajorasMask.Creator: Nintendo

OcarinaofTime.Name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
OcarinaofTime.Description: Ocarina of Time is a 1998 action-adventure game where players control Link to stop Ganondorf from obtaining the Triforce and conquering Hyrule.
OcarinaofTime.Creator: Nintendo

TurokDinosaurHunter.Name: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter
TurokDinosaurHunter.Description: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter is a 1997 first-person shooter where players control Turok as he battles dinosaurs and other foes in a prehistoric world.
TurokDinosaurHunter.Creator: Acclaim Entertainment

VirtualBowling.Name: Virtual Bowling
VirtualBowling.Description: Virtual Bowling is a 3D bowling simulation game for the Virtual Boy, offering realistic physics and multiple game modes.
VirtualBowling.Creator: Athena

VirtualBoyWarioLand.Name: Virtual Boy Wario Land
VirtualBoyWarioLand.Description: Virtual Boy Wario Land is a platform game starring Wario, utilizing the Virtual Boy's 3D effects for unique gameplay mechanics.
VirtualBoyWarioLand.Creator: Nintendo

VerticalForce.Name: Vertical Force
VerticalForce.Description: Vertical Force is a vertical-scrolling shooter for the Virtual Boy, featuring multiple layers of gameplay to utilize the system's 3D capabilities.
VerticalForce.Creator: Hudson Soft

VirtualFishing.Name: Virtual Fishing
VirtualFishing.Description: Virtual Fishing is a fishing simulation game for the Virtual Boy, offering a 3D fishing experience with various locations and fish species.
VirtualFishing.Creator: Pack-In-Video

VirtualLab.Name: Virtual Lab
VirtualLab.Description: Virtual Lab is a puzzle game for the Virtual Boy where players manipulate 3D molecular structures to create new compounds.
VirtualLab.Creator: J-Wing

VirtualLeagueBaseball.Name: Virtual League Baseball
VirtualLeagueBaseball.Description: Virtual League Baseball is a 3D baseball game for the Virtual Boy, featuring full games and a home run derby mode.
VirtualLeagueBaseball.Creator: Kemco

VTetris.Name: V-Tetris
VTetris.Description: V-Tetris is a 3D version of Tetris for the Virtual Boy, adding depth to the classic puzzle gameplay.
VTetris.Creator: Bullet-Proof Software

Waterworld.Name: Waterworld
Waterworld.Description: Waterworld is a game based on the movie of the same name, adapted for the Virtual Boy with 3D action gameplay.
Waterworld.Creator: Ocean Software

WaveRace64.Name: Wave Race 64
WaveRace64.Description: Wave Race 64 is a 1996 jet ski racing game known for its realistic water physics and engaging gameplay.
WaveRace64.Creator: Nintendo
